me awasthawe chinthakage atha randunu giniawiyen sunilge hisata wedi prahara ella kara sakakaruwan 04 dena thriwilar rathaye nangi pala gos atha.winadi 05 kata pamana kalayakadi ghathana ilakkaya sapura gath sakakaruwan pala yamen pasu biththiya ayine mettaya yata sangawi siti saya hawiridi putha eliyata pana “amma beraganna” yanuwen kagasima nisa raswu asalwasin thuwalakaruwan rohalata genagiyath ee wana witath sunil saha samanmali yuwala dehawiridi saha saya hawiridi puthun dedena thanikota siyalu denata poduwu maranayata path wi thibuni.me aparadhayata sambandha wu enam samanmali ghathanaya kala dewani sakakaru wana hamudawen palawith aparadhawalata sambandha wu hakmana mialla pradeshaye padinchi amith priyadarshana namathi pudgalaya kambaurugamuwa oowitagama kalayedi polisiya samanga 22 dina aluyama siduwu wedi huwamaruwen miyagos thibe.siddhiyata sambandha chinthaka athulu anith dedena nithiye rahanata hasukara ganimata polisiya akhanda meheyum diyath kara atha.

"kathawa dolawen gamana payin" "kohombaa gahata karawila wala giya wage" "katussage kare raththaran banda wage" "kakille rajjuruwange nadu thinduwa wage" "kana kasbawa wiya siduren ahasa balanna wage" "kimbaul kandulu helima" - boruwata andanawa "kabarayata thalanawa" - nishpala danduwamak dima "kithulata giya ekatath kiyanna dewal thibunalu" "kiri gahata anna wage" - hariyatama hari giya gasanskaranaya "garandi mara paw purawa ganima" - ahinsakayan ta hirihara kirima sudusu nowana bawa "gamarala diwa්ya loke giya wage" "gamaralage wangediya wage" - sama deyakatama pawichchi wana bhandayakata me nama yede "gangata kapuwa ini wage" - prathipala nathi wadak kirima "gahen watuna minihata gona anna wage" "gahe katu ul karanna oona da" "gala hondanam ambaarana kaha mak weda" "gangen diya bi muhudata aawadanna wage" "galen patta gannawa wage" "gale paharapu balala wage" "gal palena boru kima" "ginipenellen bata kapu eka kanamadiri eliyatath bayayilu" "gaha danna minihata kola kada panna wage" "gili male atha datha suddo - itha durlabha minisun sitima" "gilimaleth atha datha suddo" "gahapu berekuth na bere paluwakuth na" jasanskaranaya "jadiyata mudiya wage" - itha thadin galapima thasanskaranaya "thattu karannata dora are" diyakawage pite lunu hanguwa wagesanskaranaya "dilisena siyalla raththaran nowe"- bahira opayata norawatiya yuthuyidi" "kirata balaluth sakkilu"- kawuruth wasi atha paththa ta ekathu we" "dilisena siyalla raththaran nowe" "dahata aran siyata dunna wage" "dath nathi da uk dandu gini thapinnada" nasanskaranaya "nariya huwen handuna gatha hakiya" - kapatiya kathawen handuna gatha hakiya "nayata andukola wageyi" - dakimata kohethma akamathi wima "natannata bari miniha polawa adayi kima" - adakshaya thama barikama wahaganimata wena deyaka waradak kima "natapu natumakuth na, bere paluwakuth na" "nangi pennala akka denawa wage" "nida sitina yodayeku wage" " nodanna yakata wada danna yaka hodayi"' palu gehi walan biduna wagesanskaranaya "paninnata pera sitha balanu" - yamak kirimata pera kalpana kara baliya yuthuyi "puhul hora karen dane" - bahira iriyawu walin waradakaru soya ganima "pawata pin denna ba" - balahathkarayen kenekuta yahapathak kala nohakiya "pirunu kale diya nosale" - ugathun nihathamani we.
